incidents.name: SMS Delivery Delays and Call Failures to Verizon Network in the US

incident_updates.body: As per confirmation from Verizon Network, they have resolved the problems on their platform. We can also confirm stability in Twilio SMS and Voice services at this time. This incident has been resolved.

affected_components.name: CARRIER NETWORK - SMS Long Code, North America
CARRIER NETWORK - SMS Short Code, North America
CARRIER NETWORK - Voice, North America

incident_updates.body: Verizon Network has confirmed recovery on their services. We continue to monitor the situation, with no major impact on Twilio's Services due to this particular issue. Our engineers are working with Verizon Network to follow up with a resolution for this issue. We will provide another update in 2 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

affected_components.name: CARRIER NETWORK - SMS Long Code, North America
CARRIER NETWORK - SMS Short Code, North America
CARRIER NETWORK - Voice, North America

incident_updates.body: Verizon Network has confirmed recovery on their services. We continue to monitor the situation, with no major impact on Twilio's Services due to this particular issue. affected_components.name: CARRIER NETWORK - SMS Long Code, North America
CARRIER NETWORK - SMS Short Code, North America
CARRIER NETWORK - Voice, North America

incident_updates.body: Verizon Network is still working in order to identify and resolve the situation. We can confirm that we are still not seeing major impact on Twilio's Services due to this particular issue. Our engineers are working with Verizon Network to follow up with a resolution for this issue. We will provide another update in 2 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

affected_components.name: CARRIER NETWORK - SMS Long Code, North America
CARRIER NETWORK - SMS Short Code, North America
CARRIER NETWORK - Voice, North America

incident_updates.body: We have been informed that Verizon Network in the US is experiencing an outage on their system that can potentially impact our SMS and Voice Services. We can confirm that currently we have not identified a major impact for Twilio’s customers, although customers may experience issues with their overall Verizon messaging and voice services. Our engineers are working with Verizon to follow up the resolution of the issue. We will provide another update in 1 hour or as soon as more information becomes available.

incidents.name: Elevated HTTP 500 Errors for Twilio APIs

incident_updates.body: Twilio APIs were degraded for 10 minutes between 17:35 and 17:45 UTC on 09/30/2024. During this period of time customers may have experienced HTTP 5XX errors on various APIs.

incidents.name: Connectivity Lost on ~16% of Super SIM Devices

incident_updates.body: The incident affecting Super SIM active data session connectivity has been resolved, and the product is operating normally at this time.

affected_components.name: INTERNET OF THINGS - Super SIM

incident_updates.body: We are now seeing recovery with regards to Super SIM Connectivity Data Session Drop. We are continuing to monitor for service stability. We will provide another update in 2 hour or as soon as more information becomes available.

affected_components.name: INTERNET OF THINGS - Super SIM

incident_updates.body: Our monitoring systems have detected a potential issue with regards to Super SIM Connectivity Data Session Drop. Beginning at 4:20AM UTC, we observed ~16% of active data sessions on Super SIM being dropped. About 4% of devices may still experience connectivity issues. Our engineering team is actively working alongside the affected network provider to resolve the issue as quickly as possible. In the meantime, we kindly suggest that customers reset the connectivity through the console or through the APIs (by reactivating SIMs) if they notice that some of their SIM cards are still experiencing issues. We will provide another update in 4 hours or sooner once more information becomes available.

affected_components.name: INTERNET OF THINGS - Super SIM

incident_updates.body: Beginning at 4:20AM UTC, we observed ~16% of active data sessions on Super SIM being dropped. Our engineering team is continuing to investigate the issue. We will provide another update in 2 hours or sooner once more information becomes available.

affected_components.name: INTERNET OF THINGS - Super SIM

incident_updates.body: Beginning at 4:20AM UTC, we observed ~16% of active data sessions on Super SIM being dropped. Our engineering team is actively working on identifying and resolving the issue. We will provide another update in 1 hour or sooner once more information becomes available.

affected_components.name: INTERNET OF THINGS - Super SIM

incident_updates.body: Our monitoring systems have detected a potential issue  with regards to Super SIM Connectivity Data Session Drop. Our engineering team has been alerted and is actively investigating. We will update as soon as we have more information.

incidents.name: Upcoming Changes to International Short Codes and Alphanumeric Sender IDs For AT&T Mexico

incident_updates.body: As there is currently no customer impact, we are marking this Status Post as resolved. We will be informing Twilio customers about the upcoming commercial changes and the migration process updates in the next few days.

affected_components.name: CARRIER NETWORK - SMS Short Code, North America

incident_updates.body: Due to commercial changes and the conclusion of AT&T Mexico's exclusive International A2P contract, all dedicated short codes and registered alphanumeric sender IDs for international customers may be affected starting October 1st. Until the migration to a new partner is complete, short codes and alphanumeric sender IDs are expected to be replaced. Despite these changes, message delivery will remain uninterrupted. We appreciate your understanding during this transition and will keep you updated on the migration process.

affected_components.name: CARRIER NETWORK - SMS Short Code, North America

incidents.name: Programmable Messaging affected

incident_updates.body: Twilio Programmable Messaging was affected for 1 hour and 22 minutes between 06:41 and 08:03 Pacific Time on 08/25/2024. During this period of time customers may have experienced SMS Delivery Delays and Failures to KDDI Network in Japan for a Subset of Longcodes and Alphanumeric Sender IDs. The issue has now been resolved.

incidents.name: Twilio Provisioner affected

incident_updates.body: Twilio Provisioner was degraded for 733 minutes between 21:18 on 09/25/2024 and 09:31 on 09/26/2024 Pacific Time. During this period of time customers may have experienced Error 500 when submitting 10DLC and Toll-Free provisioning requests. The issue has now been resolved.
